Title: SpellLight - Lightweight Silverlight Spell Checker Library
Description: SpellLight is a lightweight Silverlight Spell Check library
HomeWiki:
Project Description
SpellLight is a lightweight spell check library utilizing Google Spell Check API. The main objectives while building this library have been the following:
  • Lightweight - No additional dependancies to external dicitonary files/resources
  • Extensibility - The library is extensible for adding additional spell check providers in future.
  • Ease of use - Can be added to any Silverlight project with minimal steps

Please feel free to use in your projects and let me know your comments.
